Today's impeachment process resolution fails to give the minority the same rights present during the Clinton impeachment, & it fails to offer the same due process protections given to both Presidents Nixon & Clinton. 

My full remarks from floor debate on H. Res. 660 ⬇️ pic.twitter.com/dsKxaFRAYQ

Spent much of the afternoon & evening with @RulesReps debating @SpeakerPelosi's impeachment process resolution. Sadly, the process laid out is far from fair, open or transparent. That is a disservice to the American people. Watch my opening remarks: pic.twitter.com/Ua406ekWcH

I am concerned by the president’s decision to swiftly withdraw U.S. troops in Northeast Syria. This policy is a risky move that will not only undo significant gains but may well invite aggression by other bad actors & terrorists. Full statement ⬇️ https://bit.ly/2LVm3ao
